Title: The Next Doctor
Writer: Russell T. Davies, Kit Pedler (characters: "Cybermen"), Gerry Davis (characters: "Cybermen")
Actors: David Tennant, David Morrissey, Dervla Kirwan, Velile Tshabalala
Plot: The Doctor arrives in London on Christmas Eve in 1851 where he encounters the Cybermen and a man who claims he's a Time Lord called the Doctor.
